about_the_game:
STORY

Embark on a mystical quest that blends Slavic folklore with arcane witchcraft to uncover the truth behind a vanished village.

Investigate supernatural clues, confront hidden forces and harness your powers as a novice witch to rescue those lost to the shadows.

But be warned: some secrets are better left undiscovered.

FEATURES

  • Immersive Slavic Folklore
    Explore a narrative steeped in Eastern European myths and legends, where every location pulses with ancient magic and long-forgotten tales.

  • Engaging Detective Gameplay
    Investigate clues, piece together evidence and unravel hidden motives to uncover the true cause of the village’s disappearance.

  • Novice Witch’s Journey

    Experience the mystery through the eyes of a budding witch, bridging the mundane and the magical to uncover hidden truths and navigate moral dilemmas.

  • Compelling Visual Novel Experience
    Shape your story through dialogue choices, moral dilemmas and meaningful interactions with memorable characters and supernatural beings.

  • Feline Familiar
    Your cat does more than provide company - his keen senses and mystical intuition can be the key to cracking the case.

  • Atmospheric Art & Music
    Immerse yourself in hauntingly beautiful visuals and an evocative soundtrack that amplifies every dramatic turn in the plot.
